thread.title: On Forging Deep Client Relationships

author: wsjcom
title: On Forging Deep Client Relationships
text:
Darnel Bentz • Senior vice president, Kayne Anderson Rudnick, Los Angeles • Education: B.S. Arizona State University; MBA UCLA Anderson School of Management • Professional designations: Chartered Mutual Fund Counselor (CMFC)
Background: For Mr. Bentz, personal hardship provided a window into the value of good financial guidance. When Mr. Bentz was in college, his father passed away and in the following months, he watched his mother struggle with the financial fallout of losing a spouse. From managing the proceeds from...
